content: Toxic spam. Requesting a fast delete <@&754066708418920553>

author: ajsutton
content: Thanks for flagging. Sometimes discord fails to delete all the messages when we ban a user - it's very annoying and means having to go through each individual channel manually deleting things. It's easy to miss some channels.

author: pietjepuk
content: Yeh, it's not great. A little easier is searching for messages of said user, and deleting them from there.
